mapper.select: SELECT medicine_base_table.medicine_code, medicine_base_table.medicine_name, medicine_base_table.medicine_price, medicine_base_table.medicine_time FROM medicine_base_table;

SELECT medicine_base_table.medicine_code, medicine_base_table.medicine_name, medicine_base_table.medicine_price, medicine_base_table.medicine_retail, medicine_base_table.medicine_time FROM medicine_base_table WHERE medicine_base_table.medicine_code= #{medicine_code};

SELECT medicine_warehouse_table.medicine_code, medicine_warehouse_table.medicine_batch_number, medicine_warehouse_table.create_time, medicine_base_table.medicine_name, medicine_base_table.medicine_price, medicine_base_table.medicine_retail FROM medicine_warehouse_table INNER JOIN medicine_base_table ON medicine_base_table.medicine_code = medicine_warehouse_table.medicine_code WHERE medicine_warehouse_table.medicine_code = #{medicine_code} AND medicine_warehouse_table.create_time=CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY medicine_warehouse_table.medicine_batch_number DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT medicine_base_table.medicine_code FROM medicine_base_table ORDER BY medicine_base_table.medicine_time DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT medicine_warehouse_table.medicine_code, medicine_warehouse_table.medicine_batch_number, medicine_warehouse_table.warehouse_count, medicine_warehouse_table.canuse_count, medicine_warehouse_table.create_time, medicine_warehouse_table.towarehouse_time, medicine_warehouse_table.towarehouse_operator, medicine_warehouse_table.outwarehouse_time, medicine_warehouse_table.outwarehouse_operator FROM medicine_warehouse_table WHERE medicine_warehouse_table.medicine_code = #{medicine_code} AND medicine_warehouse_table.create_time = STR_TO_DATE(#{create_time}, '%Y%m%d') AND medicine_warehouse_table.medicine_batch_number = #{medicine_batch_number};
